Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal Microorganism Multiplex Nucleic Acid-Based Assay
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Automated real-time reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert Norovirus qualitative RT-PCR assay for detection and differentiation of norovirus GI and GII RNA from unpreserved stool using GeneXpert platforms
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for identification and differentiation of norovirus genogroup I and II RNA from raw or unpreserved unformed stool specimens from individuals with symptoms of acute gastroenteritis, aiding diagnosis of norovirus infection and outbreak detection
